text: Milvignes is a municipality of the district of Boudry in the canton of Neuchâtel in Switzerland. It was created on 1 January 2013, when the municipalities of Auvernier, Bôle and Colombier combined to become Milvignes.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 2 January 2013 == References == Category:Municipalities in Boudry Category:2013 establishments in Switzerland
title: Milvignes
